articles.title: Poco M3 to Go on Sale Today via Flipkart: Price in India, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Poco M3 is set to go on sale in India via Flipkart starting at 12pm (noon) today, February 16. The smartphone is offered in two storage configurations and three colour options to choose from. Check out the price and notable specifications of the smartphone.
